PageInfo.Message:
The magic arrows of the Element Archer not only
allow for attacks, but also enable healing and
support for oneself and allies.
<Basic Controls/Support>
<PADM> Press [<KC WEAPON_MAIN>] for True Support
Stance.
<KEYM>Hold [<KC HOLD_BOW>] + scroll wheel
forward/backward [<ICON MOUSE_WHL_4>] to switch to
a different stance (if using default settings).
<PADM>Hold [<KC WEAPON_MAIN>] + move right stick
for Magick Eye: True Aid, which can lock onto
multiple allies.
<KEYM><KC HOLD_BOW> for Magick Eye: True Aid
(Support Arrow Stance)</KEYM>
While in stance, press [<KC SHOOT>] to shoot True
Aid Arrows.
Press [<KC CHANGE_ARROW>] for Healing Shroud and
self-recovery.
